title.rendered: Black Friday Weekend Barrel Race Nov 24th – 25th, 2023

content.rendered:
Saddle up for some barrel-racing fun at the Black Friday Weekend Barrel Race!

This exciting event will take place on Friday and Saturday, November 24th and 25th, 2023, at Triple Crown Equestrian Center in Lincoln, California.

Whether you’re a seasoned barrel racer or a curious newcomer, this is the perfect opportunity to show off your skills and compete for some great prizes.

There will be Open Barrel Racing and Pee Wee Barrel Racing classes, so everyone can get in on the action.

And of course, no rodeo would be complete without delicious food and plenty of vendors to browse through.

So mark your calendars and get ready for a fun-filled weekend of barrel racing!

Here are the details:

  • When: Friday, November 24th and Saturday, November 25th, 2023
  • Time: 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM
  • Where: Triple Crown Equestrian Center 3033 Gladding Rd Lincoln, California 95648
  • Cost: Open Barrel Racing: $65 per entry, Pee Wee Barrel Racing: $25 per entry
  • Sanctions: West Coast Barrel Racing Association (WCBRA), Women’s Professional Rodeo Association (WPRA)
  • Prizes: Cash prizes will be awarded to the top finishers in each class.

In addition to the barrel racing competition, there will also be a variety of other activities taking place throughout the weekend.

These activities include:

  • A team roping competition
  • A vendor fair
  • Food trucks
  • Live music

So come on out and join us for a weekend of fun and excitement at the Black Friday Weekend Barrel Race!

For more information, please contact Classic Barrel Racing at (707) 372-1555 or visit their website at http://www.classicbarrelracing.com/
